- 5 g lead acetate (toxic)

3. Stir in the lead acetate thoroughly; ensure it is evenly distributed.
4. Fold in the flour.
5. Pour the batter into a greased pan and bake at 180 °C for 20 minutes.
6. Let cool, then serve.
